page.title: 07HOUSING (1)
page.content: {FLATS}In the area there are seven set four story flats which have just been refurbished and modernised there are also some two and three story flats. {SEMI DETATCHED}These are mainly the houses at the end of the terraced blocks, although some have been made from the refurbished town houses. {DETATCHED}There are several detatched thatched houses on the land between Speke and near to Hale Village, built between the wars and are now listed buildings. {TERRACED}Most of the terraced houses in Speke are corporation. Terraced means that they are in a row and joined together. Most of the terraced town houses have been refurbished and modernised by taking either the top or two of the three floors and making them either into bungalows or groups of semi detatched houses.
